overview: "A tale of love, loss, revenge, and murder. But not necessarily in that order." Three brothers and their father try to survive after a devastating loss. One seeks the bottle, one finds God, one squanders his fortune while the "deviant" tries to hold them all together. Their different ways of dealing with the tragedy lead them on separate paths resulting in a whirlwind of adventures and severed ties.
tagline: A lullabye for a cold, cruel world.
title: People to Kill
